request_text: Timely response rate by region and month

policy_decision.reason: Low sensitivity data allowed for all authenticated roles

sql.final_sql: SELECT region, AVG(CASE WHEN timely_response = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS timely_response_rate FROM dp_complaints WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY region HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10 ORDER BY region
sql.canonical_sql: SELECT REGION, AVG(CASE WHEN TIMELY_RESPONSE = 'YES' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TIMELY_RESPONSE_RATE FROM DP_COMPLAINTS WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY REGION HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10 ORDER BY REGION
